about_the_game:
The nostalgic melodies of Capcom's 2000 32-bit RPG classic Breath of Fire IV ignite Steam! Breath of Fire IV Original Soundtrack makes its Western debut, featuring 67 tunes brimming with Yoshino Aoki's orchestral and folkish flavor.

The 137+ minute soundtrack has been reauthored from the original, high quality source material. Formats include MP3 (V0), FLAC (16-bit), and AAC (VBR).
